Class AdminMoviesController

java.lang.Object
com.group18.controller.admin.AdminMoviesController
public class AdminMoviesController extends Object
Controller for managing movies in the admin interface. Allows adding, updating, deleting movies, and filtering them based on genre and search terms.

    Filters the movie list based on selected genres and search query.

    Handles deleting a inserted Movie object by using movieDAO.removeMovie()

    Opens a file chooser to select a movie poster image.

    Updates the selected movie with the new details.

    Loads movies from the database into the table.

    Populates movie details into the UI fields for the selected movie.

    Sets up the actions column in the movies table for handling delete actions.

    setupButtonHoverAnimation(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
    Sets up hover animation for the given button, where the button shrinks slightly when pressed and returns to its original size when released or the mouse exits the button area.

      private void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType type, String title, String content)
      Displays an alert with the specified alert type, title, and content.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the alert (e.g., ERROR, INFORMATION, etc.).
      title - The title of the alert window.
      content - The content of the alert message.

    • clearFields

      private void clearFields()
      Clears the form fields, resets selected genres, and unchecks all genre checkboxes.

    • setupButtonHoverAnimation

      public void setupButtonHoverAnimation(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Sets up hover animation for the given button, where the button shrinks slightly when pressed and returns to its original size when released or the mouse exits the button area.
      Parameters:
      button - The button to apply the hover animation to.
